instance_reference.name: ui_layout
instance_reference.description: UI layout which is shown when enable_requirement is satisfied, ie. the mode is enabled

template_reference.name: display_requirement
template_reference.description: Conditional logic to determine whether the mode is visible to the player

template_reference.name: enable_requirement
template_reference.description: Conditional logic to determine whether the mode is enabled or disabled to play. Tested only if display_requirement is satisfied

bool.name: display_time
bool.description: Determines whether the time remaining UI element is active on the game mode tile

template_reference.name: start_time_utc
template_reference.description: Determines the start time of the mode in UTC time zone

template_reference.name: end_time_utc
template_reference.description: Determines the end time of the mode in UTC time zone

bool.name: online_required
bool.description: If true, player must be online to see this game mode
